title: Mark Hughes: Piastri gets payback he deserves in Dutch masterclass
summary: Oscar Piastri finally saw fate swing his way at Zandvoort, as Lando Norris' retirement gave the Australian's championship chances a major boost.Mark Hughesanalyses the Dutch GP

qa_pairs.question: Which driver experienced a retirement that benefitted Oscar Piastri's championship chances during the Dutch GP?
In which country was the Dutch Grand Prix held, where Oscar Piastri had a significant performance?
What type of race event was Oscar Piastri participating in when he had a boost in his championship chances?
